languages.text: "Путь Изгоя тернист и извилист. Она стала чужой на собственном мире. И осталась чужой в мире вовне. Но меня согревают мысли о том, что вы расстались без кровопролития. Я уважаю твой выбор".

traits.locale_text: "Путь Изгоя тернист и извилист. Она стала чужой на собственном мире. И осталась чужой в мире вовне. Но меня согревают мысли о том, что вы расстались без кровопролития. Я уважаю твой выбор".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "The Path of the Outcast is a meandering and thorny one. She became a stranger to her own world. And remained a stranger to the world outside. But I am warmed by the thought that you parted ways with no bloodshed. I respect your choice."
languages.original_text: "Путь Изгоя тернист и извилист. Она стала чужой на собственном мире. И осталась чужой в мире вовне. Но меня согревают мысли о том, что вы расстались без кровопролития. Я уважаю твой выбор".

traits.locale_text: "The Path of the Outcast is a meandering and thorny one. She became a stranger to her own world. And remained a stranger to the world outside. But I am warmed by the thought that you have parted ways with no bloodshed. I respect your choice."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "The Path of the Outcast is a meandering and thorny one. She became a stranger to her own world. And remained a stranger to the world outside. But I am warmed by the thought that you have parted ways with no bloodshed. I respect your choice."

traits.locale_text: "The Path of the Outcast is a meandering and thorny one. She became a stranger to her own world. And remained a stranger to the world outside. But I am warmed by the thought that you parted ways with no bloodshed. I respect your choice."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "The Path of the Outcast is a meandering and thorny one. She became a stranger to her own world. And remained a stranger to the world outside. But I am warmed by the thought that you parted ways with no bloodshed. I respect your choice."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «La Senda del Proscrito es sinuosa y espinosa. Se convirtió en una forastera en su propio mundo, y nunca dejó de serlo para el mundo exterior. Pero me alegra saber que vuestros caminos se separaron sin derramamiento de sangre. Respeto tu decisión».
languages.original_text: "The Path of the Outcast is a meandering and thorny one. She became a stranger to her own world. And remained a stranger to the world outside. But I am warmed by the thought that you parted ways with no bloodshed. I respect your choice."

traits.locale_text: «La Senda del Proscrito es sinuosa y espinosa. Se convirtió en una forastera en su propio mundo, y nunca dejó de serlo para el mundo exterior. Pero me alegra saber que vuestros caminos se separaron sin derramamiento de sangre. Respeto tu decisión».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「追放者の道は曲がりくねった茨の道だ。彼女は自分自身の惑星でよそ者となり、外の惑星においても変わらずよそ者だ。だが、お前は流血なしでそれと決別できたことには、私は心が温まった。お前の選択に敬意を表しよう」
languages.original_text: "The Path of the Outcast is a meandering and thorny one. She became a stranger to her own world. And remained a stranger to the world outside. But I am warmed by the thought that you parted ways with no bloodshed. I respect your choice."

traits.locale_text: 「追放者の道は曲がりくねった茨の道だ。彼女は自分自身の惑星でよそ者となり、外の惑星においても変わらずよそ者だ。だが、お前は流血なしでそれと決別できたことには、私は心が温まった。お前の選択に敬意を表しよう」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “流亡者之路蜿蜒曲折，荆棘丛生。对她自己的世界而言，她沦为了陌生人，而外面的世界也视她为外来者。不过，得知你们分道扬镳时并没有流血，我的心里感到了温暖。我尊重你的选择。”
languages.original_text: "The Path of the Outcast is a meandering and thorny one. She became a stranger to her own world. And remained a stranger to the world outside. But I am warmed by the thought that you parted ways with no bloodshed. I respect your choice."

traits.locale_text: “流亡者之路蜿蜒曲折，荆棘丛生。对她自己的世界而言，她沦为了陌生人，而外面的世界也视她为外来者。不过，得知你们分道扬镳时并没有流血，我的心里感到了温暖。我尊重你的选择。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « La Voie de l'Errance est tortueuse et difficile. Elle est devenue étrangère à son propre monde. Tout en restant étrangère au monde extérieur. Mais, je suis heureux d'apprendre que vos chemins se sont séparés sans effusion de sang. Je respecte votre choix. »
languages.original_text: "The Path of the Outcast is a meandering and thorny one. She became a stranger to her own world. And remained a stranger to the world outside. But I am warmed by the thought that you parted ways with no bloodshed. I respect your choice."

traits.locale_text: « La Voie de l'Errance est tortueuse et difficile. Elle est devenue étrangère à son propre monde. Tout en restant étrangère au monde extérieur. Mais, je suis heureux d'apprendre que vos chemins se sont séparés sans effusion de sang. Je respecte votre choix. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Der Pfad des Ausgestoßenen ist dornig und hat viele Windungen. Sie wurde zur Fremden in ihrer eigenen Welt. Und blieb eine Fremde in der Außenwelt. Aber mich berührt der Gedanke, dass sich Euch Wege ohne Blutvergießen getrennt haben. Ich respektiere Eure Entscheidung."
languages.original_text: "The Path of the Outcast is a meandering and thorny one. She became a stranger to her own world. And remained a stranger to the world outside. But I am warmed by the thought that you parted ways with no bloodshed. I respect your choice."

traits.locale_text: "Der Pfad des Ausgestoßenen ist dornig und hat viele Windungen. Sie wurde zur Fremden in ihrer eigenen Welt. Und blieb eine Fremde in der Außenwelt. Aber mich berührt der Gedanke, dass sich Euch Wege ohne Blutvergießen getrennt haben. Ich respektiere Eure Entscheidung."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Yurtsuzun Yolu, dolambaçlı ve dikenli bir yoldur. Kendi dünyasına bile yabancı oldu çıktı. Dışarıdaki dünyaya yabancı olmayı da sürdürdü. Neyse ki kan dökülmeden yollarınızın ayrıldığı düşüncesi içimi ısıttı. Seçimine saygı gösteriyorum."
languages.original_text: "The Path of the Outcast is a meandering and thorny one. She became a stranger to her own world. And remained a stranger to the world outside. But I am warmed by the thought that you parted ways with no bloodshed. I respect your choice."

traits.locale_text: "Yurtsuzun Yolu, dolambaçlı ve dikenli bir yoldur. Kendi dünyasın için bile bir yabancıya dönüştü. Dışarıdaki dünyaya bir yabancı olmayı da sürdürdü. Ancak hiç kan dökülmeden yollarınızın ayrıldığı düşüncesi içimi ısıttı. Seçimine saygı gösteriyorum."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
